title: Give Thanks to God in Heaven
description:
Readings from:
Revelation 4:2-6,8b-11
Today's passages were read by Jackson Grout, a graduate student at Ohio University and member of Brookfield Church in Athens, OH.
One Minute With the Bible is brought to you by the Christian Standard Bible. New episodes published every weekday.
